name: IT_201_Sprint2_Maulik_Patel
description: This is a rudimentary game where upon clicking and dragging your cursor you can create various sizes of spheres, cubes and cylinders in different colors and make designs with them. You can clear the screen at will or the game will wipe itself after 3 seconds of drawing unless the toggle check is turned off. You can also erase what you drew by right clicking and dragging the mouse on whatever you had drawn previously. Sounds will be heard when creating the objects. The objects drawn will have the laws of gravity apply to them. There is a shake option which will shake the whole screen and its contents. You have the option to turn off the sound as well. Slow motion as a concept of time has also been implemented in this sprint.
